languages.text: {n}Взгляд Торбальда поднимается к вашему псайберворону, кружащему под сводами мостика. Волк широко улыбается.{/n} "На Фенрисе такими бестиями одаривают достойнейших. Коли у тебя хватает воли сладить с ним — значит, в храбрости ты не уступишь рунным жрецам. Мы найдем общий язык".

{n}Thorbald raises his gaze to look at your psyber-raven circling over the bridge. The Wolf smiles broadly.{/n} "On Fenris, only the worthiest are granted the company of such creatures. Since you have the will to handle one, your courage must rival that of a Rune Priest. The two of us should see eye to eye."
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд Торбальда поднимается к вашему псайберворону, кружащему под сводами мостика. Волк широко улыбается.{/n} "На Фенрисе такими бестиями одаривают достойнейших. Коли у тебя хватает воли сладить с ним — значит, в храбрости ты не уступишь рунным жрецам. Мы найдем общий язык".

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald raises his gaze to look at your psyber-raven circling over the bridge. The Wolf smiles broadly.{/n} "On Fenris, only the worthiest are granted the company of such creatures. Since you have the will to handle one, then your courage must rival that of a Rune Priest. The two of us should see eye to eye."

Since you have the will to handle one, then your courage must rival that of a Rune Priest. The two of us should see eye to eye."

Since you have the will to handle one, your courage must rival that of a Rune Priest. The two of us should see eye to eye."

Since you have the will to handle one, your courage must rival that of a Rune Priest. The two of us should see eye to eye."

Since you have the will to handle one, your courage must rival that of a Rune Priest. The two of us should see eye to eye."

{n}Thorbald raises his gaze to look at your psyber-raven circling over the bridge. The Wolf smiles broadly.{/n} "On Fenris, only the worthiest are granted the company of such creatures. Since you have the will to handle one, your courage must rival that of a Rune Priest. The two of us should see eye to eye."

languages.text: {n}Thorbald hebt den Blick und beobachtet deinen Psitech-Raben, wie er über der Brücke kreist. Der Wolf lächelt breit.{/n} "Auf Fenris wird nur den Würdigsten die Gesellschaft solcher Kreaturen gewährt. Da Ihr den Willen habt, eine zu halten, muss Euer Mut dem eines Runenpriesters gleichen. Wir beide sollten uns auf Augenhöhe begegnen."
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald raises his gaze to look at your psyber-raven circling over the bridge. The Wolf smiles broadly.{/n} "On Fenris, only the worthiest are granted the company of such creatures. Since you have the will to handle one, your courage must rival that of a Rune Priest. The two of us should see eye to eye."

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald hebt den Blick und beobachtet deinen Psitech-Raben, wie er über der Brücke kreist. Der Wolf lächelt breit.{/n} "Auf Fenris wird nur den Würdigsten die Gesellschaft solcher Kreaturen gewährt. Da Ihr den Willen habt, eine zu halten, muss Euer Mut dem eines Runenpriesters gleichen. Wir beide sollten uns auf Augenhöhe begegnen."

languages.text: {n}Thorbald lève les yeux vers votre psyber-corneille qui survole la passerelle, puis affiche un grand sourire.{/n} « Sur Fenris, la compagnie de telles créatures n'est accordée qu'aux plus dignes. Si vous avez suffisamment de volonté pour maîtriser cet oiseau, votre courage doit rivaliser avec celui d'un prêtre des runes. Je crois que nous allons nous entendre. »
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald raises his gaze to look at your psyber-raven circling over the bridge. The Wolf smiles broadly.{/n} "On Fenris, only the worthiest are granted the company of such creatures. Since you have the will to handle one, your courage must rival that of a Rune Priest. The two of us should see eye to eye."

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald lève les yeux vers votre psyber-corneille qui survole la passerelle, puis affiche un grand sourire.{/n} « Sur Fenris, la compagnie de telles créatures n'est accordée qu'aux plus dignes. Si vous avez suffisamment de volonté pour maîtriser cet oiseau, votre courage doit rivaliser avec celui d'un prêtre des runes. Je crois que nous allons nous entendre. »

languages.text: {n}索巴德抬起头，看着你的渡鸦在舰桥上盘旋，对你露出了灿烂的笑容。{/n}“在芬里斯，只有最有价值的勇士，才有权与这些渡鸦为伍。既然你的意志足以驾驭这只渡鸦，那你的勇气肯定也能与符文牧师相媲美。咱们两个应该挺合得来的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald raises his gaze to look at your psyber-raven circling over the bridge. The Wolf smiles broadly.{/n} "On Fenris, only the worthiest are granted the company of such creatures. Since you have the will to handle one, your courage must rival that of a Rune Priest. The two of us should see eye to eye."

traits.locale_text: {n}索巴德抬起头，看着你的渡鸦在舰桥上盘旋，对你露出了灿烂的笑容。{/n}“在芬里斯，只有最有价值的勇士，才有权与这些渡鸦为伍。既然你的意志足以驾驭这只渡鸦，那你的勇气肯定也能与符文牧师相媲美。咱们两个应该挺合得来的。”

languages.text: {n}Thorbald alza la mirada para observar a tu psicocuervo sobrevolar el puente. El Lobo sonríe con ganas.{/n} «En Fenris, solo los más dignos pueden obtener la compañía de tales criaturas. Como tiene la voluntad necesaria para controlar a una, su valor debe de ser igual al de un Sacerdote Rúnico. Creo que podemos ponernos de acuerdo».
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald raises his gaze to look at your psyber-raven circling over the bridge. The Wolf smiles broadly.{/n} "On Fenris, only the worthiest are granted the company of such creatures. Since you have the will to handle one, your courage must rival that of a Rune Priest. The two of us should see eye to eye."

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald alza la mirada para observar a tu psicocuervo sobrevolar el puente. El Lobo sonríe con ganas.{/n} «En Fenris, solo los más dignos pueden obtener la compañía de tales criaturas. Como tiene la voluntad necesaria para controlar a una, su valor debe de ser igual al de un Sacerdote Rúnico. Creo que podemos ponernos de acuerdo».

languages.text: {n}トールバルドは目を上げて、ブリッジを旋回するあなたのサイバーレイヴンを見つめる。狼はにっこりと笑った。{/n}「フェンリスでは、いちばんふさわしい者だけが、こんな生き物を持つことを許されてるんだ。お前にそれを操る意志があるなら、その勇気はルーンプリーストにも匹敵するはずさ。俺たち、気が合いそうだな」
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald raises his gaze to look at your psyber-raven circling over the bridge. The Wolf smiles broadly.{/n} "On Fenris, only the worthiest are granted the company of such creatures. Since you have the will to handle one, your courage must rival that of a Rune Priest. The two of us should see eye to eye."

traits.locale_text: {n}トールバルドは目を上げて、ブリッジを旋回するあなたのサイバーレイヴンを見つめる。狼はにっこりと笑った。{/n}「フェンリスでは、いちばんふさわしい者だけが、こんな生き物を持つことを許されてるんだ。お前にそれを操る意志があるなら、その勇気はルーンプリーストにも匹敵するはずさ。俺たち、気が合いそうだな」

languages.text: {n}Thorbald, başını kaldırıp köprü semalarında daireler çizen ruhsiber kuzguna bakıyor. Kurt, dişlerini göstererek gülümsüyor.{/n} "Fenris'te böylesi yaratıkların refakati ancak en liyakatli olana bahşedilir. Sen onu idare edecek iradeye sahipsen yürekliliğin de bir Rün Rahibi'ninkiyle boy ölçüşür olmalı. Görüşlerimiz bir olmalı."
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald raises his gaze to look at your psyber-raven circling over the bridge. The Wolf smiles broadly.{/n} "On Fenris, only the worthiest are granted the company of such creatures. Since you have the will to handle one, your courage must rival that of a Rune Priest. The two of us should see eye to eye."

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald, başını kaldırıp köprü semalarında daireler çizen ruhsiber kuzguna bakar. Kurt, dişlerini göstererek gülümser.{/n} "Fenris'te böylesi yaratıkların refakati ancak en liyakatli olana bahşedilir. Sen onu idare edecek iradeye sahipsen yürekliliğin de bir Rün Rahibi'ninkiyle boy ölçüşür olmalı. Görüşlerimiz bir olmalı."
